| polymer : PC71BM |

The material entity in this paragraph is "polymer : PC71BM". It is an active layer in solar cells, as mentioned in the paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer : PC71BM |

In this paragraph, there is only one material name mentioned, which is "polymer : PC71BM". The other term, "solar cells", refers to a device or system rather than a specific material.
